title: SMC_Trafo_4AxisPalletizer (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_Trafo_4AxisPalletizer
Inverse transformation for a 4-axis palletizer.
Assumptions:
All a_i in the config are non-negative,
a_2
and
a_3
are not less than
g_fSMC_CNC_EPS
The valid range for axis 0 (
dQ0
)
is contained in
]-180Â°,
180Â°[
The valid range for axis 1 (
dQ1
)
is contained in
[-90Â°,
90Â°]
The valid range for axis 2 (
dQ2
)
is contained in
]-180Â°,
90Â°[
The valid range for axis 3 (
dQ3
)
is not constrained and may be greater than
360Â°

rows.Name: config
rows.Comment: The configuration settings of the palletizer

rows.Name: pi
rows.Comment:
The current position and orientation
in world coordinates:dX,dY,dZ, and C

rows:
Whether axis 0 is set so that the palletizer faces the target
(FALSE) or that it faces the opposite direction (TRUE)

rows.Name: dQ0
rows.Comment: The value of axis 0 in degrees

rows: The value of axis 1 in degrees
The value of axis 2 in degrees
The value of axis 3 in degrees
Whether an error occured during the computation
The detailed result of the computation
